TextView.android:text:
- You can send and receive message in this mode
- To interpret the morse code place the morse signal source inside of the blue cirle which is in the middle of display and then touch the start button.
- To Send your message touch the send button and enter message
- Received message is displayed in the red bar and transmitting message is displayed in the blue bar
- If you touch the start button, the software will restart learning the pattern of receiving morse signal sequence.
- If the characters interpreted is not correct, touch the start button again.
- First a few characters would not be correct right after the start button touched until the software finish learning the signal pattern.
- If morse signal that you want to interpret is too far or too small use zoom in button

[Start]: It reset morse code decoding related parameters and restart morse code pattern learning algorithm.
[Send]: You can enter your text and send them. This funciton is supported only in flash light mode.
[+]: Zoom In.
[-]: Zoom Out
